comments:
Opening a WSDL in the WSDL Editor which contains an inline schema import which 
cannot be resolved results in a Null Pointer Exception (resulting in the WSDL 
file not being opened).
We need a null check in the resolve(String, String) method.

Here is the stack trace:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI.createURIWithCache(URI.java:558)
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI.createURI(URI.java:492)

(XSDSchemaDirectiveImpl.java:384)

(XSDImportImpl.java:472)

(XSDSchemaImpl.java:2108)

(XSDSchemaImpl.java:2131)

(XSDSchemaImpl.java:2156)
	at 
org.eclipse.xsd.impl.XSDConcreteComponentImpl.resolveAttributeDeclaration
(XSDConcreteComponentImpl.java:2466)

(XSDAttributeDeclarationImpl.java:199)

(XSDConcreteComponentImpl.java:521)

After the discussion with Ed, it was determined the problem was not in 
XSDSchemaDirectiveImpl.java
